hardwareAbstraction
Interface UltrasonicPoller

All Known Implementing Classes:
NXTRemoteUltrasonicPoller
public interface UltrasonicPoller

This class serves as a higher level abstraction of a ultrasonic sensor. It is wrapped in a poller class which will now handle the returned values and the polling of that sensor. The ultrasonic sensors are assumed on the slave brick.

Method Detail

start

void start()
Starts this instance of the ultrasonic poller Stop must be called to stop the reading again.

resetUSP

void resetUSP()
Resets the ultrasonic sensor values to the default -1 values. The ultrasonic sensor will never return negative values during normal operation. Stops the polling during this operation to avoid overwriting good data.

isSetup

boolean isSetup()
Checks if the ultrasonic sensor has collected atleast 5 values. It does this by checking for any negative numbers in the readings.

pingLeft

void pingLeft()
Mode where the RemoteUltrasonicPoller will only ping the left Ultrasonic sensor

pingRight

void pingRight()
Mode where the RemoteUltrasonicPoller will only ping the right Ultrasonic sensor

pingCenter

void pingCenter()
Mode where the RemoteUltrasonicPoller will only ping the center Ultrasonic sensor

pingAll

void pingAll()
Mode where the RemoteUltrasonicPoller will ping all the Ultrasonic sensors at the same time

pingSequential

void pingSequential()
Mode where the RemoteUltrasonicPoller will ping all the Ultrasonic sensor, but only one at a time

pingSides

void pingSides()
Mode where the RemoteUltrasonicPoller will only ping the left and right Ultrasonic sensor

stop

void stop()
Stops this instance of the ultrasonic poller Start must be called to start reading again.

getUSReading

int getUSReading(int sensor)
Returns the filtered data for the sensor (median filtering)

Parameters:
sensor - id of the sensor
Returns:
filter data

getLowestReading

int getLowestReading()
gets the lowest reading in the ultrasonicPoller at that time. Readings are not taken temporarily as they are not needed;

Returns:
The smallest reading of the last 5 polls.

getLowestSensor

UltrasonicPoller.USPosition getLowestSensor()
This method gets the number representation of the US with the lowest value out of all the ultrasonic sensor. So if the center has the lowest reading,
